name: Tower Of Lumeth
description:
Summary

Play as a Sorcerer from the lands of Ethshar! Navigate the Tower of Lumeth, pushing boxes onto finish points to progress. Use spells with special traits to help you solve puzzles, and complete each level using as few as possible!

Instructions
  • Arrow Keys to move
  • Number Keys for Tailsmans:
    • 1 = Pull
    • 2 = Push
    • 3 = Teleport
    • 4 = Swap
  • Space = Next Level
  • Esc = Main Menu
  • R = Restart
